title: permanently banned by friends
body:
it was this year, my friend borrowed my account to duo with his friends. i was prepare for my exam.

but, a half month later. my account has permanently banned, so? it's not my fault. and how can i remove the ban?????? or give up the account? i spend over 500 dollars in LOL...

replies.body: [**Account sharing**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204214670) is indeed against the ToU, but with that being said, go ahead and hit up our account specialists in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they might still be able to help out.

Account sharing is also against the terms of use. Considering you gave your friend access to your account, not only does that in and of itself warrant a suspension, but you accepted responsibility for his actions on your account.

As such, it is near impossible you get the suspension removed.
